buddy_profile.name: Bhavani Prakash
buddy_profile.title: Co-founder - Sustainable Gaia
buddy_profile.introduction: I am the Co-Founder of Sustainable Gaia, a Singapore based sustainability consultancy, focusing on sustainability reporting using GRI, TCFD, UNSDGs, ISO 14064 and other frameworks. I also help companies through sustainability consulting, training and research to help them meet and go beyond ESG compliance needs, to manage risks and to unlock opportunities while transitioning to a net zero world. I have a background in Finance (MBA from IIM Calcutta), Financial Economics (M.Sc from University of London) and ESG (through various certifications and sustainability experience). I have done curriculum development and training for a wide range of companies, and agencies like National Environmental Agency and Lee Kuan Yew School of Public Policy around Systems Thinking and Social Entrepreneurship respectively.
qualifications: M.Sc Financial Economics from University of London
top_3_advice: Be generous in your sharing. I believe there is so much to learn from one another, and that one gains even more by giving!

Collaboration is key which is why I am so proud to be a part of The Matcha Initiative, where there are so many like-minded peers who can support one another through learnings as well as through shared assignments.

In the age of climate anxiety, be the voice of hope. It may be a messy future with twists and turns, but the voice of hope is what will lead the brain (individual and collective brain) to come up with innovative societal, economic and technological solutions.
buddy_profile.how_to_help: Share various regulatory changes in sustainability reporting, sustainability strategy and training tips, mentoring, and simply having a chat on anything green!

buddy_profile.challenges_and_solutions: Back in the 2010s, felt frustrated that climate action awareness was growing too slowly. Overcame by continuing to talk at every possible forum and never giving up hope. Got chance to speak in front of PM Lee Hsien Loong and C-suite members (about 800 people) in 2014 about importance of sustainability.
buddy_profile.proudest_achievement: Most proud when audience members or clients share their 'aha' moments during engagements. These moments that induce positive behaviour change are so satisfying and rewarding, making the sustainability journey meaningful.
